content: quote: After 24 years and more than $100 billion spent to develop a U.S. missile defense, an American-operated system proposed for Europe would cost billions more to deploy and still may fail, a series of independent reports has concluded. President Barack Obama recently suggested he would consider scrapping the Europe system in exchange for Russia’s help in thwarting Iran’s nuclear ambitions. During last year’s campaign, Obama said he would support missile defense if it proved workable. (USA Today, March 16, 2009, Pg. 1) Most expensive ****-off contest EVER!
quote: After 24 years and more than $100 billion spent to develop a U.S. missile defense, an American-operated system proposed for Europe would cost billions more to deploy and still may fail, a series of independent reports has concluded. President Barack Obama recently suggested he would consider scrapping the Europe system in exchange for Russia’s help in thwarting Iran’s nuclear ambitions. During last year’s campaign, Obama said he would support missile defense if it proved workable. (USA Today, March 16, 2009, Pg. 1)
title: Missile Defense Called Costly, Faulty in Tests
